text: As many as 680 saplings were planted across the district by the district unit of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) on Wednesday as part of a State-wide campaign to mark the 68th birthday of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa. Former minister and district Secretary N. Thalavai Sundaram inaugurated the exercise at Camrin International School. On Monday, the Collector inaugurated the campaign at MET Engineering College at Aralvoimozhi. The district administration has been given a target to plant 2,12,500 saplings.
title: Saplings planted
